event.title: SEXI2013読み会
event.catch: Workshop on Search and Exploration of X-Rated Information (SEXI 2013)
event.description:
SEXI2013読み会

Web Search and Data Mining 2013(WSDM)のワークショップとして開催されたWorkshop on Search and Exploration of X-Rated Information (SEXI 2013)の読み会です．

資料

公式ページ
予稿集

論文一覧

発表された論文は以下のものです．

  • Adult Query Classification for Web Search and Recommendation
  • Learning from the Internet Porn Industry: What Porn Sites May Tell Us about Pornography Location Behaviors
  • Sex, Privacy and Ontologies
  • Exploring YouPorn Categories, Tags, and Nicknames for Pleasant Recommendations
  • Identifying VHS Recording Artifacts in the Age of Online Video Platforms

発表者

SEXI2013

  • dichika (Sex, Privacy and Ontologies, SEXI2013)
  • john_a_dreams (Exploring YouPorn Categories, Tags, and Nicknames for Pleasant Recommendations, SEXI2013)
  • jkomiyama (Learning from the Internet Porn Industry: What Porn Sites May Tell Us about Pornography Location Behaviors, SEXI2013)
  • masa_kzm (Identifying VHS Recording Artifacts in the Age of Online Video Platforms, SEXI2013)
  • sleepy_yoshi (Adult Query Classification for Web Search and Recommendation, SEXI2013)

WSDM2013

  • y_benjo (Threading Machine Generated Email, WSDM2013)
  • Quasi_quant2010 (Unsupervised Graph-based Topic Labelling using DBpedia, Learning Query and Document Similarities from Click-through Bipartite Graph with Metadata, WSDM2013)
  • ysekky (Connecting Comments and Tags: Improved Modeling of Social Tagging Systems, WSDM2013)
  • harapon (Identifying Users’ Topical Tasks in Web Search, WSDM2013)

本会議であるWSDM2013の論文についての発表も募集します．
WSDM2013 論文一覧

会場
Gunosy様のオフィスを利用させていただけることになりました．
会場情報はこちらです．
